Package com.syncura360.service

Class DrugService

java.lang.Object
com.syncura360.service.DrugService
@Service public class DrugService extends Object
Service class responsible for managing drugs in a hospital.
Author:
Darsh-KP

  • Method Details

    • createDrug

      public void createDrug(int hospitalId, DrugFormDTO drugFormDTO)
      Creates a new drug in the hospital's inventory if it does not already exist.
      Parameters:
      hospitalId - The ID of the hospital.
      drugFormDTO - The data transfer object containing drug details.
      Throws:
      jakarta.persistence.EntityExistsException - If the drug with the given NDC already exists.

    • updateDrug

      public void updateDrug(int hospitalId, DrugUpdateDTO drugUpdateDTO)
      Updates an existing drug in the hospital's inventory.
      Parameters:
      hospitalId - The ID of the hospital.
      drugUpdateDTO - The data transfer object containing updated drug details.
      Throws:
      jakarta.persistence.EntityNotFoundException - If the drug with the given NDC does not exist.
      IllegalArgumentException - If any input constraints are violated (e.g., negative quantity or invalid price).

    • deleteDrug

      public void deleteDrug(int hospitalId, DrugDeletionDTO drugFormDTO)
      Deletes a drug from the hospital's inventory.
      Parameters:
      hospitalId - The ID of the hospital.
      drugFormDTO - The data transfer object containing the drug details to be deleted.
      Throws:
      jakarta.persistence.EntityNotFoundException - If the drug with the given NDC does not exist.

    • fetchDrugs

      public DrugFetchListDTO fetchDrugs(int hospitalId)
      Fetches a list of all drugs for a given hospital.
      Parameters:
      hospitalId - The ID of the hospital.
      Returns:
      A DrugFetchListDTO containing a list of all drugs for the hospital.
